attributes.action: Sack all those responsibile for not protecting Baby P
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Surely every decent person in our society must stand up for Baby P and demand that those people paid to protect and keep from harm those who are unable to cry for help be SACKED when they fail to do the job they are hired to do.
In private enterprise if you do not perform you pay  for your incompetence with your job.Lets stop pampering those who think working in the public sector is a licence for a job for life even if your actions mean children die a violent barbaric death in the 21st society. If all of us hardworking decent moral people dont shout that this is unacceptable then we have let this baby down again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
